document_data.name: Alurlyath
document_data.mainbody: '''Alurlyath''' was a [[wine]] crafted somewhere in [[Undermountain]] and sold through contacts in [[Skullport]].
document_data.Description: This full-bodied sweet white wine had a slightly nutty aftertaste. Alurlyath glowed with silver and green light, further enhancing it on a romantic evening. It was usually stored in special ceramic bottles during transport to keep the light from fading.
document_data.Availability:
* It was also sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] as '''Undermountain ''Alurlyath'''''.
* This wine was served at the [[Low Lantern]], a tavern in the town of [[Eveningstar]], [[Cormyr]]. However, alurlyath was a rare find that could be found in the tavern's wine cellar.
* The [[Friendly Arm]] inn in the [[Western Heartlands]] offered alurlyath for six [[gold]] [[coin]]s per serving.
* In [[Athkatla]], the capital of [[Amn]], alurlyath was available from the luxurious [[Mithrest Inn]].
document_data.Prices:
Undermountain ''Alurlyath'' could be purchased from Aurora's in the following containers:
* Ceramic bottle (5 [[sp]])
* Hand keg (30 sp)
* Cask (8 [[gp]])
Aurora's noted that contact with this wine's creators was required to purchase more than a hand keg.
